definition: to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)

sentences.english: This beautiful Cuvée Prestige has a deep ruby-red color.
sentences.chinese: 該款佳釀呈現出深邃的紅紫色寶石的顏色。

sentences.english: Knowing him was like drinking it.
sentences.chinese: 而瞭解他則像酣飲佳釀。

sentences.english: Enjoy with grilled meats, steaks - especially tenderloin.
sentences.chinese: 是一款紅肉類佐餐的佳釀。

sentences.english: This wine with its delicious residual sugar is typical for the Rheingau.
sentences.chinese: 這款含有適量剩餘糖分的葡萄酒是典型的萊茵高佳釀。

sentences.english: This year so far, the Fine Wine 50 index is up just over 9%.
sentences.chinese: 到今年爲止，佳釀50指數剛上升超過了9%。

sentences.english: Were it not so, far better would it be to fail, for happiness is the wine that sharpens the taste of the meal.
sentences.chinese: 如果不這樣，我會失敗，因爲快樂是提味的美酒佳釀。

sentences.english: She loaded up his collection of vintage wines into crates.
sentences.chinese: 她把他收藏的陳年佳釀裝進板條箱裏。

sentences.english: The level of this wine is CRIANZA.
sentences.chinese: 此酒是一款佳釀級別的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: White wine from Australia with expression of citrus fruits very refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲乾白佳釀，淨爽自然，橙果芳香甜美清新。

sentences.english: This Cabernet Sauvignon Reserva comes from Colchagua Valley.
sentences.chinese: 此款佳釀產自於智利康加瓜山谷。

sentences.english: There are none to decline your nectared wine.
sentences.chinese: 沒有誰拒絕與你共飲美酒佳釀。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to taste a small amount/to sample
